episode.title: Drew Municipal Separate School Dist. v. Andrews

section.heading: Opinion Announcement of Chief Justice Warren E. Burger

turn.speaker: warren_e_burger
turn.label: Chief Justice Warren E. Burger
turn.text: In 74-1318, Drew Municipal Separate School District against Andrews for reasons stated in an opinion for the court filed with the clerk this morning, the judgment of the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit is dismissed the petition for certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Fifth Circuit is dismissed as improvidently granted.
